title: Retro Block Typeface
content:
Hey guys and gals,  
 Have spent at least 3-4 hours looking for this typeface i found it on a flyer and would like to use it for a graphic design piece but alas have had no luck with the font.

Any help would be much appreciated, it reads SUMME ARTY

Ben

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100726074330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-3_4525.jpg)
author: bennimartin

comments.content: Have a look at this list of [fat fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100726074330/http:/typophile.com/node/42643).
Looks like the closest one is disco deck. But it's not a complete match. Any one else have any suggestions?

[Bifurk](http://web.archive.org/web/20100726074330/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=bifurk&page=1&nb_ppp_old=50&text=SUMME+ARTY&nb_ppp=50&af=on&psize=m&classt=alpha) by Gragoury.

Quote: »I created the "Bifurk" for the Jazz-Rock band "Bifurk Trio". I wanted to use the Iconian font's "Disco Deck" as a basis, but it wasn't covering all my needs and desires, so I decided to modify it to suit what I had in mind. Here is the result. The personal, non-commercial use of my font is free. The use of my fonts for commercial and profit purposes is prohibited, unless a small donation is send to me. Contact: gragoury [at] yahoo [dot] Fr«
